courseSectionInformation: 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: GEOG 101, GEOG 110, and ECON 101 are highly recommended.
description: Patterns and processes of Third World development geography. Lectures and discussion draw upon theoretical and case study material by development geographers working in Asia, Africa, and Latin America. 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: GEOG 101, GEOG 110, and ECON 101 are highly recommended.
label: Geography of Dev and Underdev
